game: Super Mario RPG Legend of the Seven Stars

0.0.1.description:
While this update does bring some more of the 0.5.0 changes over (not sure if they were needed, but we did it) it also cleans up some of the code so generation no longer throws that list of **is/not** nonsense,

Fixes Shiny Stone being sent to Key Items if sent from server via /send or !getitem.

Also fixes Forest Maze Red Essence being swapped with another location in Forest Maze, and potentially the underground locations as well. 

Yaml included has the problematic locations excluded, so I'd recommend snagging that or copying it from the pins in the SMRPG thread. 

Happy Gaming!
0.0.1.title: Cleaned up code

0.0.2.description:
Fixes alto card being in the pool 3 times, and now gives you the others and locks Toad Seller behind `Bambino Bomb` proper.

Thank you @bigmalletman again!
0.0.2.title: Small update (Courtesy of @bigmalletman)

0.0.3.description: @bigmalletman hammered down some more troubled locations, so now the marrymore chest should be less of a mega-chest and more of a mini-mega-chest and the Bowser chests that have been mapped properly *should* behave (although it would seem we have some other issues to deal with lol)
0.0.3.title: Another small update (Courtesy of @bigmalletman)

0.0.4.title: ANOTHER update (Courtesy of @bigmalletman)

0.0.5.description:
This change should prevent client locking up if "You Missed!" wasn't made local via the yaml. Thanks to @FrozenSake for the fix!

BE SURE TO USE BIZHAWK WITH THE SNES9X CORE!!!
0.0.5.title: "You Missed!" Update

0.0.6.description:
Mostly just a compatibility fix for 0.6.3, option_definitions was deprecated but we rode it out as long as we could.

Should also prevent Bambino Bomb/Castle Key 1+2 from being locked behind themselves (hopefully)

BE SURE TO USE BIZHAWK WITH THE SNES9X CORE!!!

BE SURE "INCLUDE CULEX" IS SET TO TRUE IN YOUR YAML SETTING FOR NOW!!!
There seems to be a bug with Star Pieces still being placed there when set to false which can result in unbeatable seeds.
0.0.6.title: 0.6.3 Fix and more!

0.0.7.description:
This should hopefully fix Star Pieces being forced onto Culex even when the option was set to false, IF THAT ISN'T THE CASE LET ME KNOW IN THE THREAD PLEASE!

BE SURE TO USE BIZHAWK WITH THE SNES9X CORE!!!

BE SURE TO USE THE DEFAULT YAML INCLUDED WITH THIS RELEASE AS THE EXCLUSION LIST IS NECESSARY!!!
0.0.7.title: Culex Be Gone!

0.0.8r2.description:
Courtesy of @Mysteryem

***"This apworld is currently only asking for the rom once it reaches generate_output. apworlds that need a rom to generate should really be implementing stage_assert_generate to check that the rom is in place and correct. stage_assert_generate gets called right at the start of generation with output, so if the rom is missing or invalid, any issues can be identified immediately, instead of waiting until the very end of generation."***

So now it asks for the ROM beforehand, hopefully, I couldn't test it 😃 

I guess lmk if that isn't the case.
0.0.8r2.title: Ask for ROM before generation
